cause.description:
GREEN architecture. Designs that promote life, and restore ecosystems. Generation of GREEN energy (hydro, wind, biomass, etc.). Think sustainable. DO not use plastic materials. Reuse existing materials wherever possible. More description to come...
1. Design/build with care to this planet.
2. Help restore eco-systems with design.
3. Use methods/materials that benefit, not harm, this world.
4. Think long-term, and how many different uses the application will change in it's lifetime...
5. Help re-design, or design towns and cities to focus more on community and neighborhood involvement.
cause.mission: Become Stewards of the land, and design/build eco-friendly so future generations are able to experience what we have today, tomorrow.
cause.name: Build GREEN
